subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A referee can spray what looks like shaving cream at the spot where a free kick should be taken before pacing off the 10 yards where a wall will form.
snippet: A referee can spray what looks like shaving cream at the spot where a free kick should be taken before pacing off the 10 yards where a wall will form.
